title: 8/16/17 - We used to reach higher (Jason Ripley joins Glenn)
description:
Can somebody choose the side of...Americans? ...What we all want for our children ...We used to reach higher ...Let's avoid sound bites and actually talk to each other ...Black group protecting Confederate memorials ...Anti-Trump guy executes his Trump-supporting neighbor ...'I'm against the terrorists but..." ...Jason Riley, author of 'False Black Power' discusses Charlottesville and the surmountable gap in race relations in America ...How the DNC gets a lot of mileage out of exploiting blacks.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
